text: to kya un logon ne rooe zameen par chal phir kar nahin dekha ki jo log unake pahale the aur unase zor va koovat mein bhee kaheen badh-chadh ke the phir unaka (naafaramaanee kee vajah se) kya (kharaab) anjaam hua aur khuda aisa (gaya guzara) nahin hai ki use koee cheez aajiz kar sake (na itane) aasamaanon mein aur na zameen mein beshak vah bada khabaradaar (aur) badee (qaaboo) kudarat vaala hai
